text: [Music]
I would say the best place to start for
a young person or any person is an asset
allocation Mutual Fund mutual funds are
really are perfect for somebody who
doesn't have the time to really follow
their Investments nor really have the
knowledge so an asset allocation mutual
fund invests in a diversified portfolio
of stocks bonds and cash depending and
and the asset allocation that you choose
or the mutual fund you choose depends on
your risk tolerance you know how much
can risk can you accept internally and
what your time frame is for
investing another alternative that's
becoming very popular is the life cycle
fund and it's similar to the asset
allocation fund where again it's in that
Diversified portfolio of stocks bonds
and cash and as time goes on it we
adjusts the amount of stocks and bonds
as you get closer to your target date so
it becomes more conservative so those
are two really good um examples but but
keep in mind that anybody who plans to
invest you need to uh set that money
aside or you know mentally set that
money aside for at least 5 years
otherwise you risk selling at a time you
know when the market might have a you
know a short-term
dip
I
